predecessorTaskId.description: The identifier for the predecessor task. This must reference a task in Gantt.

shortDesc.description: The description of the dependency line. This is used for accessibility.

successorTaskId.description: The identifier for the successor task. This must reference a task in Gantt.

svgClassName.description: A space delimited list of CSS style classes to apply to the dependency line.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style defining the style of the dependency line.

finishFinish.description: predecessor task must finish before successor task can finish

finishStart.description: predecessor task must finish before successor task can start

startFinish.description: predecessor task must start before successor task can finish

startStart.description: predecessor task must start before successor task can start
